settings.title: Caviar Club Subscription  For True Gourmets
settings.subtitle: You have tried our caviar, and now you don’t want to stop. You seek to have this exquisite flavor and elegant rituals associated with this magnetic product. Luckily, we have good news for you: we have a special offer for real caviar connoisseurs — the Caviar Club.
settings.mobile_text:
• Join the premium Caviar Club
  • Our goal is to make premium
    Black Caviar more available and allow
    you to enjoy high-quality caviar in wholesale
  • Pay a membership subscription to receive
    all benefits

settings.left_text: The Caviar Club’s goal is to make caviar more available while offering uncompromised high quality and great service to its members. The Caviar Club is created for caviar lovers who would like to enjoy caviar monthly without overpaying for it. As a member of the club, you receive the best wholesale prices on premium quality black caviar and other perks such as free gifts for the finest caviar experience. Make caviar tasting your monthly habit!
settings.right_text: Our caviar subscription makes the product from our caviar shop more accessible, while your experience with Bester Caviar becomes richer and more varied. Get the freshest and finest caviar cultivated by experienced specialists on a regular basis and add new flavors to your everyday life. With our unique wholesale offer, you will be able to enter the market of caviar reselling easily and discover an interesting and promising business niche.

settings.label: JOIN CAVIAR CLUB TO GET 25% OFF
settings.text: Bester Caviar is owned by a young woman entrepreneur - Inna Polutska. She immigrated from Ukraine 7 years ago and now offers traditional sturgeon caviar to the American market, just like she used to have in her childhood.Back then caviar in her country was more affordable, so it was widely used not only for great taste but for health benefits as well.Now Bester’s founder is sourcing and bringing the same traditional and very delicious black caviar at a ...

settings.title: FREE OVERNIGHT DELIVERY
settings.text: Free Overnight Shipping in temperature controlled coolers for perishable goods Monday through Thursday & Same Day Free Delivery in Miami 24/7.

settings.title: PERSONALIZE YOUR ORDER WITH A GIFT CARD
settings.text: Send someone special Bester Caviar Gift Card so they can receive their fresh caviar when they are ready to indulge.

settings.title: 24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE
settings.text: Contact our caviar concierge to help you with your customized selection & delivery details: +1(813)510-9892 inna@besterusa.com

settings.title: AMAZON’S CHOICE
settings.text: Bester Caviar is best selling caviar brand on Amazon with over 500 positive customer reviews and Amazon’s Choice award: highly rated & well priced, ready to ship immediately.

settings.title: More and more quality service for our customers
settings.text: We work hard to make the caviar experience an exciting, satisfying event for you and your loved ones. Order caviar from us and enjoy the marvelous taste of top-class roes!
